author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four persons died in three separate accidents in the city on Monday and Tuesday.

In one accident, Ravi (25) and his friend Rajalakshmi (22), a bank employee, were returning after work around 11.30 p.m. on Monday. They were residents of Minjur and were on the Ennore Expressway near Tiruvottiyur.

A container truck driven by Anjaneyalu Reddy knocked them down when Ravi tried to overtake it. Ravi and Rajalakshmi died on the spot. Anjaneyalu Reddy was arrested.

Around 7 a.m., on Tuesday, V.Ponni (52), a resident of James street, Poonamalee, was walking back home when she was hit by a share autorickshaw. She was rushed to a private hospital where she was declared dead on arrival. The autorickshaw driver Radhakrishnan has been arrested.

Around 11 a.m. on Tuesday, Dinesh Murali (35), who works at a private firm was killed after a motorcycle hit him on 1st street CIT Nagar. The motorcyclist, Praveen Kumar (25), who was also injured, was arrested.
title: Four killed in road accidents
